query.statement:
WITH TEMP AS ( SELECT P.PSPID , P.CID , MAX(M01.ZSITE_NM) AS ZSITE_NM , MAX(M01.NAMET) AS NAMET , MAX(M01.NAMET2) AS NAMET2 , MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) AS ZZACTSS , MAX(G.TEXT30) AS TEXT30 , (CASE WHEN MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '21' OR MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '10' OR MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '08' -- 강북, 인천, 강원 THEN '1' WHEN MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '02' OR MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '19' OR MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '20' -- 강남, 강서, 중부 THEN '2' WHEN MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '06' OR MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '05' OR MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '07' OR MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '12' -- 대전, 광주, 전주, 제주 THEN '3' WHEN MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '03' OR MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '04' OR MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '11' OR MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '09' -- 부산, 대구, 경남, 울산 THEN '4' WHEN MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '13' OR MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '01' -- E/S, 직영 THEN '5' ELSE '6' -- 리모델링 END) AS GRUP , CASE WHEN MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '21' THEN '01' WHEN MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '10' THEN '02' WHEN MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '08' THEN '03' WHEN MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '02' THEN '01' WHEN MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '19' THEN '02' WHEN MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '20' THEN '03' WHEN MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '06' THEN '01' WHEN MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '05' THEN '02' WHEN MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '07' THEN '03' WHEN MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '12' THEN '04' WHEN MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '03' THEN '01' WHEN MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '04' THEN '02' WHEN MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '11' THEN '03' WHEN MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '09' THEN '04' WHEN MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '13' THEN '01' WHEN MAX(M01.ZZACTSS) = '01' THEN '02' ELSE '01' END AS SORT , MAX(M01.ZQNTY) AS ZQNTY , MAX(P.EXPLO) AS EXPLO , VALUE(MIN(M02.ZZSHIP1),'00000000') AS ZZSHIP1_TMP , DECODE(VALUE(MIN(M02.ZZSHIP1),'0000-00-00'),'','0000-00-00',INSERT(INSERT(MIN(M02.ZZSHIP1),5,0,'-'),8,0,'-')) AS ZZSHIP1 , DECODE(VALUE(MIN(M02.ZZCHADT),'00000000'),'','00000000',MIN(M02.ZZCHADT)) AS ZZCHADT , VALUE(( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT X1.PSPID, X1.EXPLO FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0019 AS X1 WHERE X1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X1.GBN = 'A' MINUS ( SELECT X1.PSPID, X1.EXPLO FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0019 AS X1 WHERE X1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X1.GBN = 'B' UNION SELECT X2.PSPID, X2.CDATE AS EXPLO FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTPM01 AS X2 WHERE X2.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X2.INPT = 'B' ) ) AS T WHERE T.PSPID = P.PSPID WITH UR ), 0) AS PHONE_CNT -- 현장답사(전화) , VALUE(( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT X1.PSPID, X1.EXPLO FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0019 AS X1 WHERE X1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X1.GBN = 'B' UNION SELECT X2.PSPID, X2.CDATE AS EXPLO FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTPM01 AS X2 WHERE X2.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X2.INPT = 'B' ) AS T WHERE T.PSPID = P.PSPID WITH UR ), 0) AS VISIT_CNT , VALUE(( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT X1.PSPID, X1.EXPLO FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0019 AS X1 WHERE X1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X1.GBN NOT IN ('A','B') AND X1.GBN != '' AND X1.GBN IS NOT NULL MINUS ( SELECT X1.PSPID, X1.EXPLO FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0019 AS X1 WHERE X1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X1.GBN = 'B' UNION SELECT X2.PSPID, X2.CDATE AS EXPLO FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTPM01 AS X2 WHERE X2.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X2.INPT = 'B' ) ) AS T WHERE T.PSPID = P.PSPID WITH UR ), 0) AS GITA_CNT -- 현장답사(기타) , VALUE(DECODE(T08.KWMENGT,'',0,T08.KWMENGT),0) AS DAESU
, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT X.PSPID AS PJT , X.CDATE , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY X.PSPID, X.CDATE ORDER BY X.PSPID, X.CDATE) AS RNK_PM01 FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTPM01 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X.INPT = 'B' AND X.DEL != 'X' ) AS T WHERE T.RNK_PM01 = '1' AND T.PJT = P.PSPID WITH UR ) AS MB_CNT , VALUE(MAX(MB01.PJT),'') AS MB01_PJT
FROM ( SELECT X1.MANDT , X1.PSPID , X1.EXPLO , X1.GBN , X1.CNAME AS CID FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0019 AS X1 WHERE X1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X1.GBN IN ('A', 'B', 'C', 'D') UNION SELECT X2.MANDT , X2.PSPID , X2.CDATE AS EXPLO , X2.INPT AS GBN , X2.CNAME AS CID FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTPM01 AS X2 WHERE X2.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X2.INPT = 'B' ) AS P
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 M02 ON P.MANDT = M02.MANDT AND P.PSPID = M02.POSID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 M01 ON P.MANDT = M01.MANDT AND P.PSPID = M01.POSID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.J_1AACTT AS G ON P.MANDT = G.MANDT AND G.SPRAS = '3' AND M01.ZZACTSS = G.J_1AACT LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0008 T08 ON P.MANDT = T08.MANDT AND P.PSPID = T08.POSID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT X.PSPID AS PJT FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTPM01 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X.INPT = 'B' AND X.DEL != 'X' GROUP BY X.PSPID ) AS MB01 ON P.PSPID = MB01.PJT
WHERE P.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND P.PSPID NOT LIKE 'G%' AND P.PSPID NOT LIKE 'E%' AND P.PSPID NOT LIKE 'C%' AND P.PSPID NOT LIKE 'T%' AND P.PSPID NOT LIKE 'J%' AND P.CID != '' AND P.CID IS NOT NULL AND P.GBN IN ('A', 'B', 'C', 'D') AND M02.ZZGUBUN IN ('10', '11', '12', '13', '14', '20') AND M02.PRART IN ('01', '02', '11') AND M01.ZZACTSS <> '' AND M02.ZZCHAKD BETWEEN #FROM_DT# AND #TO_DT# -- 착공예정일 GROUP BY P.MANDT, P.PSPID, P.CID, VALUE(DECODE(T08.KWMENGT,'',0,T08.KWMENGT),0)
WITH UR )
SELECT TBL.ZZACTSS , TBL.TEXT30 , TBL.CID , TBL.CNAME , TBL.GRUP , TBL.SORT , '1' AS TOTAL , ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT X1.POSID) FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 X1 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 X2 ON X1.MANDT = X2.MANDT AND X1.POSID = X2.POSID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0011 X3 ON X2.MANDT = X3.MANDT AND X2.TEMNO = X3.TEMNO WHERE X1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X2.ZZCHAKD BETWEEN #FROM_DT# AND #TO_DT# AND X2.ZZGUBUN IN ('10', '11', '12', '13', '14', '20') AND X2.PRART IN ('01', '02', '11') AND X2.ZZACTSS = TBL.ZZACTSS AND X3.USERNUMB = TBL.CID AND X2.txt04 <> 'C' ) AS POSID_CNT -- Project(현장수) , SUM(CASE WHEN TBL.RNK_POSID = '1' THEN INTEGER(TBL.DAESU) ELSE 0 END) AS DAESU -- 총 대수 , SUM(CASE WHEN TBL.RNK_POSID = '1' THEN TBL.PHONE_CNT ELSE 0 END) AS PHONE_CNT -- 현장답사(전화) , SUM(CASE WHEN TBL.RNK_POSID = '1' THEN TBL.VISIT_CNT ELSE 0 END) AS VISIT_CNT -- 현장답사(방문) , SUM(CASE WHEN TBL.RNK_POSID = '1' THEN TBL.GITA_CNT ELSE 0 END) AS GITA_CNT -- 현장답사(기타) , SUM(CASE WHEN TBL.RNK_POSID = '1' THEN TBL.TOT_CNT ELSE 0 END) AS TOT_CNT -- 현장답사(전체 횟수) , SUM(CASE WHEN TBL.RNK_POSID = '1' THEN TBL.CULHA_30 ELSE 0 END) AS CULHA_30 , SUM(CASE WHEN TBL.RNK_POSID = '1' THEN TBL.CULHA_14 ELSE 0 END) AS CULHA_14 , SUM(CASE WHEN TBL.RNK_POSID = '1' THEN TBL.CULHA_AFTER ELSE 0 END) AS CULHA_AFTER , SUM(CASE WHEN TBL.RNK_POSID = '1' AND RMN_DAY >= 10 AND RMN_DAY <= 45 THEN TBL.BEFORE_CHAKD ELSE 0 END) AS BEFORE_CHAKD , ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0011 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.TEMNO = B.TEMNO WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND (A.ZZSHIP1 BETWEEN #FROM_DT# AND #TO_DT#) AND A.ZZACTSS = TBL.ZZACTSS AND B.USERNUMB = TBL.CID AND A.ZZGUBUN IN ('10', '11', '12', '13', '14', '20') AND A.PRART IN ('01', '02', '11') AND a.txt04 <> 'C' ) AS POSID_1_CNT
, SUM(CASE WHEN TBL.RNK_POSID = '1' AND TBL.MB01_PJT != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS MB_POSID_CNT -- 실측실시 현장수 , SUM(CASE WHEN TBL.RNK_POSID = '1' THEN TBL.MB_CNT ELSE 0 END) AS MB_CNT FROM ( SELECT T.PSPID , T.ZZACTSS , T.CID , VALUE(( SELECT X.USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X.USERNUMB = T.CID ), T.CID) AS CNAME , T.ZSITE_NM , T.NAMET2 , T.TEXT30 , T.NAMET , T.EXPLO , T.ZQNTY , T.GRUP , T.SORT , T.MB01_PJT , T.ZZSHIP1_TMP
, VALUE(( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT X1.MANDT , X1.PSPID , X1.EXPLO FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0019 AS X1 WHERE X1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X1.GBN IN ('A', 'B', 'C', 'D') UNION SELECT X2.MANDT , X2.PSPID , X2.CDATE AS EXPLO FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTPM01 AS X2 WHERE X2.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X2.INPT = 'B' ) AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X.PSPID = T.PSPID AND X.EXPLO = T.EXPLO AND X.EXPLO BETWEEN TO_CHAR(DATE(T.ZZSHIP1)-40 DAY,'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(DATE(T.ZZSHIP1)-20 DAY,'YYYYMMDD')
), 0) AS CULHA_30
, VALUE(( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT X1.MANDT , X1.PSPID , X1.EXPLO FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0019 AS X1 WHERE X1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X1.GBN IN ('A', 'B', 'C', 'D') UNION SELECT X2.MANDT , X2.PSPID , X2.CDATE AS EXPLO FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTPM01 AS X2 WHERE X2.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X2.INPT = 'B' ) AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X.PSPID = T.PSPID AND X.EXPLO = T.EXPLO AND X.EXPLO BETWEEN TO_CHAR(DATE(T.ZZSHIP1)-25 DAY,'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(DATE(T.ZZSHIP1)-10 DAY,'YYYYMMDD')
), 0) AS CULHA_14
, VALUE(( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT X1.MANDT , X1.PSPID , X1.EXPLO FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0019 AS X1 WHERE X1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X1.GBN IN ('A', 'B', 'C', 'D') UNION SELECT X2.MANDT , X2.PSPID , X2.CDATE AS EXPLO FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTPM01 AS X2 WHERE X2.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X2.INPT = 'B' ) AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X.PSPID = T.PSPID AND X.EXPLO = T.EXPLO AND X.EXPLO >= TO_CHAR(T.ZZSHIP1,'YYYYMMDD')
), 0) AS CULHA_AFTER
, VALUE(( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT X1.MANDT , X1.PSPID , X1.EXPLO FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0019 AS X1 WHERE X1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X1.GBN IN ('A', 'B', 'C', 'D') UNION SELECT X2.MANDT , X2.PSPID , X2.CDATE AS EXPLO FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTPM01 AS X2 WHERE X2.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X2.INPT = 'B' ) AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X.PSPID = T.PSPID AND X.EXPLO = T.EXPLO AND (CASE WHEN T.ZZCHADT = '00000000' THEN '00000000' ELSE X.EXPLO END) <= T.ZZCHADT
), 0) AS BEFORE_CHAKD , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY T.PSPID, T.EXPLO, T.CID ORDER BY T.PSPID, T.EXPLO, T.CID) AS RNK_POSID , T.PHONE_CNT , T.VISIT_CNT , T.GITA_CNT , VALUE(T.PHONE_CNT,0) + VALUE(T.VISIT_CNT,0) + VALUE(T.GITA_CNT,0) AS TOT_CNT -- 현장답사 횟수 , T.DAESU , T.MB_CNT
, (CASE WHEN VALUE(T.EXPLO,'') = '' OR T.EXPLO = '00000000' THEN 0 WHEN VALUE(T.ZZSHIP1_TMP,'') = '' OR T.ZZSHIP1_TMP = '00000000' THEN 0 ELSE TIMESTAMPDIFF( '16', CHAR(TIMESTAMP(VALUE(T.ZZSHIP1_TMP,'00000000')||'000000') - TIMESTAMP(VALUE((T.EXPLO),'00000000')||'000000'))) END) AS RMN_DAY FROM TEMP T ) AS TBL WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY TBL.ZZACTSS, TBL.TEXT30, TBL.CID, TBL.CNAME, TBL.GRUP, TBL.SORT ORDER BY TBL.GRUP, TBL.SORT, TBL.CNAME
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
